name: Bans vs the Classic Bloxians Scratch Edition (Demo)
name_original: Bans vs the Classic Bloxians Scratch Edition (Demo)
description:
You only have one hp so you have to dodge by pressing space. You could enter doors by clicking on them.

Controls:

left arrow key: move left

right arrow key: move right

up arrow key: jump

down arrow key: shoot

space bar: dodge

click: enter doors or toggle switches

1: item 1

2: item 2

3: item 3

4: debug mode

m: pick up items

n: drop items
